description: My website where you'll find all my latest projects and, also, a little bit about who I am.

hero.headline: Hi! My name is Elias
hero.description: Fullstack Developer con especialización en Frontend. Enfocado en mejora de rendimiento web.

portfolio.title: My latest projects
portfolio.description: Digital products (Web Apps, Websites) and design systems which are very pleasing easy to use

redco.title: Red Comunidad
redco.description: Red Comunidad (Community Net) is a website for neighborhood and citizen complaints, where you may report and see citizen problems and/or of infrastructure which are common to everyone.

multi.title: Multishop
multi.description: An ecommerce fullstack app where both sellers and clients can publish and sell their products.

about.title: About me
about.1st-desc: Desarrollador y diseñador de páginas y aplicaciones web. Mi objetivo es realizar productos innovativos y generen un buen impacto a los usuarios.
about.2nd-desc: También realizo constribuciones Open Source traduciendo artículos al español en la comunidad de freeCodeCamp. Aquí puedes ver los artículos que voy traduciendo.

contact.title: Would you like to work with me?
contact.comment: Currently I'm up for work. Contact me. Send me a message and let's chat about your proposal.
